QuestData.Title: A Fine Vintage
QuestData.Description:
We will need something special to use as the base of our mixture. To get him to drink it down he will have to believe you've brought him a gift.
He fancies himself quite the connoisseur. Some ancient and stuffy vintage will tempt him.
Check the old cellar near the ruins. It once held supplies. Perhaps a bottle still lingers in the depths. Araak and I will work out the other details.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, that's perfect. He will not be able to resist this.
